cookieAccept.we_use_cookie: We use third-party cookies to personalize content, advertise and analyze website traffic.

footer.footer_description: The best Discord server assistants will make your server look more lively and liveable.
footer.if_you_need_to_contact: If you have any questions can be contacted at:

commands.body_commands_not_found_description: Maybe the command you're looking for doesn't exist. Would you like to try and give some feedback?
commands.body_data_not_found_detail: Temporarily unable to get data at this time. Please try again later.
commands.body_description: You can test it by typing the default command / Then the various commands will appear. For further use, please refer to the command information below.
commands.body_note_description: Some commands may contain conditions that do not match existing information. In this regard, we will hurry to verify that it meets the conditions we set.
commands.body_note_first_condition_mean: () means data that does not need to be added.
commands.body_note_second_condition_mean: <> means information that needs to be added.
commands.header_description: A collection of all Shioru commands currently available.
commands.meta_description: Shioru's full source of application commands with descriptions of commands, how to use them, and other interesting and useful information.

documents.contents_error_content_not_found_descrip: This page has not been added or information on this page is still empty. Please try again later
documents.contents_error_data_not_found_descriptio: No content found. at this time or may not be available in your language
documents.contents_error_empty_type_description: This document could not be processed. because the data type is not specified Please contact the administrator
documents.contents_error_link_not_found_type_descr: This document has not yet been assigned a data destination. Please contact the administrator
documents.contents_error_unknown_error_description: An unexpected problem occurred with this document. Please contact the administrator
documents.contents_error_unknown_type_description: Failed to load data from this document. because it is an unknown type. Please contact the administrator
documents.contents_page_not_found: The page could not be found.
documents.contents_page_not_found_description: The page could not be loaded. It may be because it has been moved or deleted.
documents.meta_description: Documentation on how to use it, how to use the commands, and other information needed to be available in Shioru.

home.about_developer_description: This is the person who designed the entire Shioru structure and function.
home.commands_autoplay_description: Automatically resumes music after finishing the last queue.
home.commands_ban_description: Ban members within the server who fail to comply with server agreements or other reasons.
home.commands_filter_description: Transcode the music as desired. which has more than 10 designs to choose from
home.commands_help_description: For a complete list of commands and a description of the commands to be used.
home.commands_invite_description: Generate a link for joining your server.
home.commands_join_description: Join the voice channel if available.
home.commands_kick_description: Instantly kick the desired member from the server.
home.commands_leave_description: Exit the current audio channel if available.
home.commands_leveling_description: Check the level and experience of yourself and other members. within the server
home.commands_notable_command_description: These are the most frequently used commands. For other commands use Shelp
home.commands_play_description: Play a song from the title, desired link. It is currently supported on YouTube, Spotify and SoundCloud platforms.
home.commands_purge_description: Bulk delete messages within chat channels must not exceed 100 messages
home.commands_queue_description: View songs and queues that are currently playing in the server.
home.commands_search_description: Find and play any music you want on YouTube, Spotify and SoundCloud.
home.commands_settings_description: Manage Shioru's settings to further customize the server and personal information.
home.commands_together_description: Create a room to use Discord Together with several options.
home.commands_unban_description: Unban members who are banned within the server.
home.commands_weather_description: Check the weather in any desired area around the world.
home.features_be_your_friend_description: Is there nothing to do? Let's get to know Shioru better. She doesn't just do what you ask. But she can always talk to you, no matter how big or small. She is always available for advice.
home.features_discord_together_description: Want to play games on Discord?..or try YouTube on Discord...Shioru can do You can learn how to use it with the together command.
home.features_leveling_and_experience_descrip: when starting to talk to friends or anyone Within the server where Shioru resides...Shioru Will accumulate experience (EXP) and level (Lv) in itself, which can compete with who can talk and collect the most points in the server.
home.features_more_commands_description: Shioru has a total of over 50 commands that are ready to use. You can also learn how to use or check all those commands by typing Shelp or Shelp <command>.
home.features_notify_members_join_or_leave: Notification of people entering and leaving
home.features_notify_members_join_or_leave_de: Notify people to enter and design real-time and look more alive than usual. You can set later on what notifications you can get or you can turn them off completely.
home.features_outstanding_features_descriptio: with more diverse and comprehensive capabilities
home.features_playing_music_description: Shioru can play various songs. It plays whatever you want, which plays them with high-quality bitrate. There's also an on-demand auto-playback system for added convenience and a wide range of options related to song commands.
home.invite_are_you_ready_description:
Invite Shioru to your server
Ready to enjoy these features
home.meta_description: The best Discord server assistants will make your server look more lively and liveable.
home.welcome_support_modal_description: Every baht and every penny of yours helps me to continue with other projects.
home.welcome_support_modal_thank_you: ‚ù§ Thank you in advance for your continued support

invited.meta_description: Shioru has been invited to join the server. Let's start talking!!
invited.meta_subject: Thank you for inviting Shioru to join the server.
invited.we_will_always_try_to_improve:
We will always strive to improve Shioru.
Thank you for joining us.

Eh...I've been looking for a nearby page. But no
You might be lost.
pageNotFound.meta_description: Looks like you're lost. The one you are currently viewing may have been deleted or moved.
pageNotFound.meta_subject: The page could not be found on this site.
